title: The Lightbringer : Through the Elder Stone
description: Jason never asked to become a Lightbringer. All he wanted was to take photos, but sometimes life has bigger plans. The legendary Flare now rushes through his veins, and he is given the chance to save an enchanted world from the ominous grasp of a tyrant-Emperor Darkstrom. Before he can go back home, Jason must embrace his new identity and learn how to control his newfound powers. The path is riddled with enemies, trickery and strange dreams, but also faithful companions. Will he be able to come to terms with his new destiny, or will the journey get the better of him?
author: Dael Sassoon
